ControllerCycleTargetLockTooltipRight:
Allows you to use the right stick to change your locked target.
{c_highlight}You will not be able to bind right-stick to other actions while this is enabled.{/c}
FSR2Tooltip: When enabled game will render at lower resolution, based on selected setting, and will be upscaled to display resolution using temporal upscaling techniques.
ChatBubblesClanTooltip: Displays text chat from a clan member over their head.
HotkeyMountSpeedTooltip: Gives your mount a burst of speed.
HotKeyActionWheelBindingLeftTooltip: Uses the item or action bound to this position on the left wheel.
HotkeyEquippablesTooltip: Toggles the Character details and Inventory panel.
RealIDHashesTooltip:
{c_highlight}Enabled:{/c} Displays the names of players whom you have friended using Real ID, as well as BattleTag numerical identifiers.
{c_highlight}Disabled:{/c} Hides Real ID names and BattleTag numerical identifiers.
HotKeyActionWheelBindingMiddleTooltip: Uses the item or action bound to this position on the middle wheel.
KeyboardCombineMovePrimarySkillAndIntera:
{c_highlight}Enabled:{/c} Movement, Interaction, and casting the ability assigned to your Basic Skill slot will utilize the same binding.
{c_highlight}Disabled:{/c} You can define separate bindings for movement, interaction, and casting the ability assigned to your Basic Skill slot.
HotKeySkipTTSTooltip: Skips to the next text line.
HotKeyShowItemLabelsTooltip: Refreshes display of item labels on the ground.
HotKeyScreenReaderSkipLineTooltip: Screen reader skips to the next content block.
HotKeyReWhisperTooltip: Sets the player you last whispered as your current chat target.
HotKeyQuickResponseTooltip:
Enables controls to respond to social requests from other players.

{c_red}Cannot be rebound.{/c}
HotKeyPushToTalkTooltip: Activates voice transmission when held if the player is in a voice channel.
HotKeyPageDownChatTooltip: Scrolls text chat down by a page.
HotkeyMountCombatDismountTooltip: Dismounts the player with a combat ability.
HotKeyJoinVoiceChatTooltip: Toggles speech to text transcription of your current voice channel. Only works when you are in an active voice channel.
HotKeyInteractToolip: Used to look at certain points of interest. Can also be used as a fallback key for interacting with objects and non-playable characters in the world.
HotKeyHoldPositionTooltip: Allows the player to attack without moving.
HotKeyGameMenuTooltip:
Toggles the Game Menu.

{c_red}Cannot be rebound.{/c}
HotKeyForceMoveTooltip: Moves you to your cursor's location without attacking monsters or interacting with objects.
HotKeyForceInteractTooltip: Used to look at certain points of interest. Can also be used as a fallback key for interacting with objects and non-playable characters in the world.
HotKeyExitChatTooltip:
Removes active focus from text chat.

{c_red}Cannot be rebound.{/c}
HotKeyCycleChatTargetsTooltip:
Cycles through available chat targets when text chat is active.

{c_red}Cannot be rebound.{/c}
ChatBubblesLocalTooltip: Displays text chat from a nearby player over their head.
HotKeyCombinedMovePS_InteractTooltip:
When pressed:
{c_highlight}Move:{/c} If your cursor is over terrain, your character will move to that location.
{c_highlight}Interact:{/c} If your cursor is over a clickable object or non-playable character, your player will interact with that object or character.
{c_highlight}Basic Skill:{/c} If your cursor is over a target that can be attacked, your player will cast the ability assigned to your Basic Skill Slot.
HotKeyClassScreenTooltip: Toggles your class-specific mechanic screen if relevant.
HotKeyZoomTooltip: Toggles between a zoomed in and zoomed out state.
HotKeyChatQuickMessageTooltip: Activates the quick message menu for sending pre-written phrases.
HotKeyChatNextViewTooltip:
Selects the next tab in chat when text chat is active.

{c_red}Cannot be rebound.{/c}
HotKeyChatTooltip:
Sets focus to the text chat input field.

{c_red}Cannot be rebound.{/c}
ScreenReader3rdPartyTooltip:
{c_highlight}Enabled:{/c} Allows for third party applications to handle screen reading and disables the platform's built in screen reader.
{c_highlight}Disabled:{/c} Defaults to the platform's built in screen reader.
PartyGameChannelTooltip: Enable/Disable text to speech for the Party channel.
HighlightEnemyColorTooltip: Controls the color of enemey highlights.
HighlightNPCColorTooltip: Controls the color of NPC highlights.
HotKeyFPSTooltip: Toggles Framerate Display at the bottom left of the screen.
HighlightPlayerTooltip: Draws a highlight around the player.
KeyboardCombineMovePrimarySkillAndIntera: Combine Move / Interact / Basic Skill Slot
HotKeyMoveTooltip: Moves the player to their cursor's location when pressed.
ControllerSwapSticksTooltip: If enabled, the functions of the left and right sticks will be swapped.
HotKeyScreenShotTooltip: Saves an image of your game screen to your local Documents folder.
ControllerPersistTargetLockTooltip: If enabled, target lock will remain active between encounters.
BrightnessControlPrompts: Adjust the black point to maintain as much detail as possible in the left image. Adjust the white point to maintain as much detail as possible in the right image. Adjust brightness as necessary.
WhitePointDescriptionController: Use {icon:l_horiz, 2} to adjust the white point to determine the minimum luminance that will appear white.
BrightnessDescriptionController: Use {icon:l_horiz, 2} to adjust the brightness slider until the logo is barely visible.
BlackPointDescriptionController: Use {icon:l_horiz, 2} to adjust the black point to determine the maximum luminance that will appear black.
MonsterHealthBarTooltip: Configure the display mode for monster health bar.
HeightFieldGeometryDetailTooltip: Controls the amount of detail used to render terrain meshes. Decreasing this will increase performance.
VOIPToggleTooltip: Attenuates game sounds when someone in your party is speaking in voice chat.
VOIPSliderTooltip: Adjusts the amount of attenuation on game sounds when someone in your party is speaking in voice chat.
ColorBlindFilterTooltip:
Applies a filter to compensate visuals for color blindness.

{c_highlight}Protanopia:{/c} Difficulty distinguishing red light from green light.
{c_highlight}Deuteranopia:{/c} Difficulty distinguishing green light from red light.
{c_highlight}Tritanopia:{/c} Difficulty distinguishing blue light from green light, and yellow light from red light.
ActionWheelTooltip:
{c_highlight}Press and Hold:{/c} Use the Action Wheel by pressing and holding the Action Wheel key.
{c_highlight}Press to Toggle:{/c} Press the Action Wheel key to toggle the wheel on and off. Using the wheel does not require holding the key.
MinionHealthBarsTooltip: Show health bars above summoned minions.
STTNotificationStart: Speech to text allows you to add closed captioning in a voice channel. Transcription started.
JoinSTTVoicePrompt: Transcribe Voice Chat is not currently enabled. Would you like to enable it now?
ItemDropSoundTypeOtherTooltip: Apply this effect to all other item types not listed above.
ItemDropSoundTypeSocketableTooltip:
Apply this effect to all socketable items.

{icon:AttributeBullet, 0.6}  Gems
{icon:AttributeBullet, 0.6}  Skulls
ItemDropSoundTypeJewelryTooltip:
Apply this effect to all jewelry items.

{icon:AttributeBullet, 0.6}  Rings
{icon:AttributeBullet, 0.6}  Amulets
ItemDropSoundTypeArmorTooltip:
Apply this effect to all armor items.

{icon:AttributeBullet, 0.6}  Helm
{icon:AttributeBullet, 0.6}  Chest
{icon:AttributeBullet, 0.6}  Gloves
{icon:AttributeBullet, 0.6}  Pants
{icon:AttributeBullet, 0.6}  Boots
{icon:AttributeBullet, 0.6}  Shields
ItemDropSoundTypeWeaponTooltip:
Apply this effect to all weapon items.

{icon:AttributeBullet, 0.6}  1-Handed
{icon:AttributeBullet, 0.6}  2-Handed
{icon:AttributeBullet, 0.6}  Offhands
ItemDropSoundAmbientTooltip: Enables sound effects when an item in the world is nearby.
ItemDropSoundHoverTooltip: Enables sound effects when an item in the world is targeted by the player.
ItemDropSoundToggleTooltip: Enables sound effects tied to items dropping in the world.
NoCutSceneTooltip: Toggles whether or not cut scenes are automatically skipped while playing.
TextLocaleTooltip: Determines the language of text in the game and subtitles.
ShowPlayersNearYouTooltip:
Allows you to see other players on your network who are currently online. These players will be displayed by their BattleTag. 

Disabling this feature prevents both you from seeing other players on your network and them from seeing you.
NotificationGuildMemberOnlineTooltip: Displays a notification when a clan member comes online.
HoldPositionInputModeTooltip:
{c_highlight}Hold:{/c} Activate Hold Position key by keeping the Hold Position key pressed.
{c_highlight}Toggle:{/c} Press the Hold Position key to toggle the behavior on and off.
HighlightObjectColorTooltip: Controls the color of interactable object highlights.
QuickJoinTooltip: Allow friends to join your party without an invitation.
SpeechLocaleTooltip: Determines the language of speech audio.
ChatBubblesTooltip: Displays text chat from a player over their head.
NotificationDisplayWindowTooltip: Display notifications in toast windows. If disabled, these messages will continue to be displayed in the chat window.
PlayInBGTooltip: Allows the game to continue playing sound when it is not the focus window.
NotificationFriendOnlineTooltip: Displays a notification when a friend comes online.
FontColorGuildOfficerTooltip: Clan officer messages will appear in this color in text chat.
FontColorSystemTooltip: System messages will appear in this color in text chat.
PlayerErrorAudioModeTooltip:
Controls the dialog lines spoken by the player when error text appears on the screen.

{c_highlight}On:{/c} All dialog lines are spoken
{c_highlight}Off:{/c} No dialog lines are spoken
{c_highlight}Simple:{/c} An error noise is played in place of the dialog lines.
RefreshRateTooltip: Controls the number of frames your monitor can display per second.
FSRTooltip:
When enabled game will render at a lower resolution, based on selected setting, and will be upscaled to display resolution using spatial upscaling techniques.

{c_highlight}Significantly improves performance at the cost of sharpness and image quality.{/c}
BrightnessDescription: Adjust the brightness slider until the logo is barely visible.
UnsavedChanges: You have unsaved changes. Are you sure you want to discard them?
AxeEmulateQualityTooltip:
AXE ONLY
Enabling forces the game to run with emulated console quality settings.
BackgroundOpacityTooltip: Adjusts the background opacity for subtitles.
OSCommandControlTitle: Use Command key as Control key
HotKeyQuestsPanelTooltip: Opens to your Journal within the Map screen.
CurrencyTooltip: Select which currency type you would like to use for the Real Money Auction House.
CheckerboardTooltip:
When enabled, the game will render half as many pixels per frame and use data from previous frames to reconstruct a full resolution image. 

{c_highlight}Increases performance but may cause visual artifacts and lower image quality. {/c}
GammaDisabledTooltip: Gamma is disabled while in this mode. Please switch to Fullscreen mode to enable Gamma.
LockCursorInFullscreenWindowedTooltip: Lock mouse cursor to window while in Windowed (Fullscreen) and Windowed modes.
LocaleSelectionTooltip: Select which language you would like to use.
HotKeyReplyWhisperTooltip: Sets the player who last whispered you as your current chat target.
Disable the operating system keyboard sh: :  in Security & Privacy preferences, located in System Preferences.{/c}
VoiceChatVolumeTooltip: This adjusts the volume of incoming voice chat.
QuestDialogChatTooltip: Output all quest dialog to chat window.
HotkeyAbilitiesTooltip: Toggles the Abilities side panel, which contains the Skill Tree and Paragon board.
ItemNameSpeechTooltip: Enable/Disable the item name during text to speech.
SetBindingTooltip: Change the bindings for this action.
HotKeyControllerMapTooltip:
Toggles the Map screen.

{c_red}Cannot be rebound.{/c}
MonitorTooltip: Select the monitor you would like Diablo IV to launch in.
SpatialSoundTooltip: {c_highlight}Spatial Sound{/c} is supported, but it's based on your current platform. Enable this through your system's settings.
OSCommandLeftRightTooltip: Hold down Command key and left click to simulate a right click.
SoundChannelsTooltip: Adjust the number of Sound Channels used.
SoundSpeakerSetupTooltip: Set this to match your speaker setup. Choose Stereo or headphones or standard two-speaker setups.
ControllerVibrationTooltip: Enable controller vibration effects on certain Skills and abilities.
OSCommandLeftRightTitle: Command left click as right click
ControllerInteractCombinedTitleTooltip:
When pressed:
{c_highlight}Interact:{/c} If your cursor is over a clickable object or non-playable character, your player will interact with that object or character.
{c_highlight}Basic Skill:{/c} If your cursor is over a target that can be attacked, your player will cast the ability assigned to your Basic Skill Slot.
DisplayTooltip: Allows you to change the primary display mode of the game to Fullscreen, Windowed, or Windowed (Fullscreen). Windowed modes may cause a drop in performance.
DefensiveMessagesTooltip: Display floating numbers above monsters, showing blocks, parries, and dodges.
WorldLocationsTextColorTooltip: Changes the color of World Locations displayed within subtitles.
SmartCoopMinimapTooltip: Only display the minimap when near an objective.
RaytracedShadowsQualityTooltip:
Determines the realism of ray-traced shadows. Relies on your computer's graphics processor(GPU). Lowering this setting will improve performance.

{c_highlight}Disabled:{/c} No ray-traced shadows.
{c_highlight}Low:{/c} Single ray ray-traced shadows.
{c_highlight}High:{/c} Multi rays ray-traced shadows, giving accurate contact hardening and soft shadows.

{c_red}Ray tracing is currently WIP, expect a significant a performance hit and possibly instability when enabled {/c}
OutlineOccludedActorsTooltip: Draws a highlight around you when obscured from vision.
SharpenTooltip: Adjusts the intensity of a sharpening filter on the final image.
NotificationAuctionHouseEventTooltip: Displays a notification whenever an auction house event occurs.
HealthNumbersTooltip: Display numerical health values on player health bars.
ShowPlayersNearYou: Enable Display of Local Network Players
ResolutionTooltip: Higher resolution will result in increased clarity, but this greatly affects performance. Choose a resolution that matches the aspect ratio of your monitor.
FurQualityTooltip:
Controls the level of quality of fur on player equipment, enemies, and the environment. Decrease to improve performance.

{c_highlight}Low:{/c} Lowest density of fur, some edge artifacts may be visible.
{c_highlight}Medium:{/c} Medium density of fur, moderate visual quality.
{c_highlight}High:{/c} High density of fur, highest visual quality.
HotKeyPrimarySkillTooltip: Casts the ability assigned to this slot.
RealIDHashesTitle: Show Real ID Names & BattleTag identifiers
QuestDialogSubtitlesTooltip: Display quest dialog in chat bubbles during in-game scripted sequences.
HotkeyMouseZoomTooltip:
Zooms the in-game camera in or out when the mousewheel is scrolled up or down.

While enabled, mouse up and mouse down cannot be used as bindings.
TextureTooltip:
Determines the clarity and size of textures used throughout the game. Higher texture quality will result in more detail, but it requires more system memory (RAM) and video memory (VRAM).

{c_highlight}Medium:{/c} 3 GB
{c_highlight}High:{/c} 8 GB
VSyncTooltip: Synchronizes your framerate to some fraction of your monitor's refresh rate. Enable this if you see excessive screen tearing in game.
AntiAliasTooltip: Fullscreen anti-aliasing helps soften model edges. Disabling this may improve performance.
ReflectionQualityTooltip: Controls the number of probes used for reflections. Lowering this will improve performance and memory usage at the cost of some reflections being less accurate.
HotkeyTownPortalTooltip: Casts Town Portal and returns you to the nearest discovered capital city.
ChannelSpeechTooltip: Enable/Disable the channel name during text to speech.
StoryGameChannelTooltip: [PH] Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit.
ChatTimestampsTooltip: Appends a timestamp to chat messages in the format of your choice.
SoftShadowsTooltip: Toggles whether soft shadows are rendered. Turning this off will increase performance.
VoiceChatAutoJoinTooltip: Automatically join voice chat in parties.
SSAOTooltip:
Controls the number of samples used for SSAO. Decreasing this may improve performance.

{c_highlight}Low:{/c} 16 Samples 
{c_highlight}High:{/c} 24 Samples
OuterDeadZoneTooltip: Outer Dead Zone adds a new dead zone to stick inflection, effectively shorting an input curves present making players hit maximum inflection sooner.
ClutterDensityTooltip:
Controls the density and the distance at which ground clutter items, like grass and foliage are placed. Decrease to improve performance.

{c_highlight}Off:{/c} No Clutter
{c_highlight}Low:{/c} Short distance at which clutter items are placed with low density
{c_highlight}Medium:{/c} Medium distance at which clutter items are placed with medium density
{c_highlight}High:{/c} High distance at which clutter items are placed with high density
{c_highlight}Highest:{/c} High quality which also enables shadows from clutter
PhysicsTooltip:
Determines the realism of colliding objects and gravity. Physics Quality relies on your computer's processor (CPU).

{c_highlight}Low:{/c} 75% reduction
{c_highlight}High:{/c} No reduction
NotificationDurationTooltip: Adjust the duration of the toast window.
MacNote: command key can be used in place of control key; fn+left mouse button can be used in place of right mouse button
MasterVolumeTooltip: This controls the volume of all sounds in the game.
LetterboxTooltip: Display in widescreen aspect ratio regardless of screen resolution.
ShadowTooltip:
Controls both the method and quality of shadows. Decreasing this may greatly improve performance.

{c_highlight}Low:{/c} Low-resolution terrain shadows, blob shadows for units
{c_highlight}Medium:{/c} Low-resolution terrain shadows, high-resolution dynamic shadows near player
{c_highlight}High:{/c} High-resolution dynamic shadows for entire scene
{c_highlight}Highest:{/c} High-resolution, highest quality dynamic shadows for entire scene
ChatBackgroundOpacityTooltip: Adjusts the opacity of your chat window background when the window is active.
ReflectionsTooltip: Determines whether Screen Space Reflections are rendered.
HotKeySkillsPanelTooltip: Toggles the Skill Assignment flyout from your Action Bar.
HotkeyTargetLockTooltip: When engaged on a target, all offensive abilities will attempt to hit that target.
ReverseSpeakersTooltip: Swap the sound coming from the left and right speakers.
HealingNumbersTooltip: Display floating health numbers above characters, showing healing effects on player.
SalvageConfirmationTooltip: Disables the confirmation dialog that appears when salvaging rare quality items.
VoiceChatRestricted: Voice Chat use is restricted for this user.
ItemLabelsTooltip: Briefly display item label when the item drops on the ground.
VoiceChatMicrophoneDeviceTooltip: This output device is what your voice will play through.
LockActionBarsTooltip: Prevents the user from picking up/dragging Skills on the action bar. This function can be bound to a key in the keybindings interface.
OSCommandControlTooltip: Use Command key and Control key interchangeably.
RaytracingTooltip:
Enable real time ray-tracing. Requires hardware accelerated GPU for ray-tracing.

{c_red} Ray tracing is currently WIP, expect a significant a perfomance hit and possibly instablility when enabled {/c}
DamageNumbersTooltip:
{c_highlight}Enabled:{/c} All damage dealt by the player is displayed as floating numbers on screen.
{c_highlight}Disabled:{/c} Only damage dealt by special hits are displayed as floating numbers.
SoundOutputTooltip:
The output device is where your sound will play.

Default will match your systems output device. Use this if you want to play the game through head phones or a different set of speakers.
ChatBubblesTradeTooltip: Displays text chat from a trade channel member over their head.
ClockTooltip: Toggles the display of the clock over the minimap.
PlayerHealthTooltip: Show player health bars above characters.
MonsterHealthTooltip: Show monster health bars above monsters.
LowFXTooltip: Reduces the number of rendered particle system effects. Checking this may greatly improve performance.
BlackPointDescription: Adjust the black point to determine the maximum luminance that will appear black.
XeSSTooltip:
Intel® Xe Super Sampling (XeSS) technology uses machine learning to deliver more performance with exceptional image quality.

{c_highlight}Significantly improves performance at the cost of sharpness and image quality.{/c}
ResetDefaultsConfirmation: Are you sure you want to reset {s1} to default settings?
AdvancedTooltipsTooltip: Display advanced information on tooltips such as item property ranges, Lucky Hit chance on Skills, and indicators as to whether modifications are additive [+] or multiplicative [x].
WaterSimTooltip: Determines the size of the texture used to simulate water. Higher quality will result in more detail, but it requires more video memory. Texture Quality relies on your total video memory (VRAM).
CombatHitFlashTooltip: This will enable hit flashes on characters while hitting a monster or player during combat.
NotificationFriendRequestTooltip: Displays a notification when you receive a friend request.
ClanGameChannelTooltip: Enable/Disable text to speech for the Clan channel.
FontColorErrorTooltip: Error messages will appear in this color in text chat.
LockTargetPersistsTooltip: When using lock target and your target dies, it will auto select a new one as long as a target remains.
NotificationFriendOfflineTooltip: Displays a notification when a friend goes offline.
TextToSpeechToggleTooltip: Enables or disables all text to speech.
FontColorTradeTooltip: Trade channel messages will appear in this color in text chat.
AutoEquipTooltip: Auto-equips items if you have an empty Inventory slot for that item.
WhisperGameChannelTooltip: Enable/Disable text to speech for the Whisper channel.
VoiceChatMicrophoneOutputVolumeTooltip: This adjusts the outgoing volume of your own voice.
ControllerCycleTargetLockTooltipLeft:
Allows you to use the left stick to change your locked target.
{c_highlight}You will not be able to bind left-stick to other actions while this is enabled.{/c}
MaxForegroundFPSTooltip: Enable this option to limit and adjust the maximum framerate while running in the foreground.
VoiceChatOutputDeviceTooltip: This output device is what incoming voice chat will play through. Default is your game sound output device.
VoiceChatModeTooltip:
{c_highlight}Push-to-Talk:{/c} Your voice only transmits when your push-to-talk key ({hotkey:VOICE_PTT}) is held down. This key can be adjusted under Controls.
{c_highlight}Open Mic:{/c} Automatically transmits voice when microphone sound is detected.
HotKeyChatResetFadeTooltip: Resets the fade timer on the text chat widow.
EnableTTSMessagesTooltip: [PH] Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit.
FogTooltip:
Controls both the method and quality of shadows. Decreasing this may greatly improve performance.

{c_highlight}Low:{/c} Low-resolution fog
{c_highlight}Medium:{/c} Medium-resolution fog
{c_highlight}High:{/c} High-resolution fog
ConsoleFrameRateLimitTooltip: Sets the maximum frame rate the game will be rendered at. Does not affect visual quality, but lowering this can give a more stable framerate.
ResolutionPercentageTooltip: Adjusts the scale of textures used. Default is 100%.
GeoComplexityTooltip: Controls the distance at which meshes start to lose detail. Decreasing this will increase performance.
AnisotropyTooltip: Determines the number of samples used for anisotropic filtering.
SpeechVolumeTooltip: Adjusts the speech volume of text to speech voice.
CrossNetworkCommunicationTooltip:
{c_highlight}Enabled:{/c} You will be able to text and voice chat with players on other platforms.
{c_highlight}Disabled:{/c} You will no longer be able to text or voice chat with players on other platforms.
FontScaleTooltip: Adjusts all font sizing within the game
ParticlesTooltip:
Controls how many particles are spawned.

{c_highlight}Low:{/c} 75% reduction
{c_highlight}Medium:{/c} 37.5% reduction
{c_highlight}High:{/c} No reduction
HoldSkillsToggleTooltip:
{c_highlight}Hold All:{/c} Repeating or channeling Skills requires holding the Skill input.
{c_highlight}Toggle Sustained Skills:{/c} {c_important}Channeled{/c_important} Skills like Incinerate and Whirlwind can be toggled on and off. Repeated Skills require holding the Skill input.
{c_highlight}Toggle All:{/c} Repeating or channeling Skills can be toggled on and off.
AAQualityTooltip:
Controls the number of samples drawn for Anti-Aliasing.

{c_highlight}Low:{/c} 4 Samples
{c_highlight}High:{/c} 8 Samples
HotKeyActionWheelBindingRightTooltip: Uses the item or action bound to this position on the right wheel.
ScreenReaderVolumeTooltip: Adjusts the volume of screen reader dictation.
DynamicShadowsTooltip: Toggles whether dynamic shadows are rendered. Turning this off may increase performance.
HighlightPlayerColorTooltip: Controls the color of your player highlight.
ItemLabelsOnDropTooltip: Briefly display item label when the item drops on the ground.
AdapterTooltip: Select the graphics processing unit (GPU) that you would like to use.
ShaderQualityTooltip: Controls the quality of various visual effects on a case by case basis. Decreasing this may improve performance.
InnerDeadZoneTooltip: Inner Dead Zone increases the dead zone from the stick's neutral state out, making it take longer to start registering input.
WhitePointDescription: Adjust the white point to determine the minimum luminance that will appear white.
CursorSensitivityTooltip: Determines the cursor sensitivity on the user interface.
HotKeyMountTooltip: Summons the player's mount if available.
RaytracedReflectionsQualityTooltip:
Determines the realism of ray-traced reflections. Relies on your computer's graphics processor(GPU). Lowering this setting will improve performance.

{c_highlight}Disabled:{/c} No ray-traced reflections.
{c_highlight}Low:{/c} Single ray ray-traced reflections, with approximated blur from rough materials.
{c_highlight}High:{/c} Multi rays ray-traced reflections, giving accurate blur from rough materials.

{c_red}Ray tracing is currently WIP, expect a significant a performance hit and possibly instability when enabled {/c}
DLSSTooltip:
When {c_highlight}Deep Learning Super Sampling{/c} is enabled, the game will render at a lower resolution, based on selected setting, and will be upscaled to the display's resolution using deep learning.

{c_highlight}Significantly improves performance but may introduce visual artifacts.{/c}
TranscribeVoiceChatTooltip:
Enables speech to text transcription of active voice channels.

View our Online Privacy Policy on {c_highlight}https://blizzard.com/legal/{/c} for more information.
DLSSGPUTooltip: {c_red}DLSS can only be enabled if you have an RTX capable NVIDIA GPU{/c}
DLSSDriverTooltip: {c_red}Your GPU drivers are out of date, please update them to use DLSS. {/c}
HotKeyChatPrevViewTooltip:
Selects the previous tab in chat when text chat is active.

{c_red}Cannot be rebound.{/c}
CrossNetworkPlayTooltip:
{c_highlight}Enabled:{/c} You will encounter and be able to play with players on other platforms.
{c_highlight}Disabled:{/c} You will no longer encounter or be able to interact with players on other platforms. Clan feature will become blocked.
PriorityTooltip:
Adjusts variable resolution threshold balancing image quality and responsiveness.

{c_highlight}Frame rate: {/c} Reduces rendering resolution when frame rate drops below 60 fps - targeting improved latency
{c_highlight}Image Quality: {/c} Improved image quality at the expense of frame rate
HUDConfigurationTooltip: Choose a configuration for your Life, Resource, and Skill bar.
DistortionTooltip: Controls whether screen space distortion is applied. Decreasing this may improve performance.
ChatChannelJoinLocalTooltip: Local chat channel includes players near you within Sanctuary.
ChatChannelJoinTradeTooltip: Trade chat channel is solely used for trading items.
TutorialsTooltip:
{c_highlight}Enabled:{/c} All tutorials will be shown.
{c_highlight}Disabled:{/c} Only tutorials specific to new features in Diablo IV will be shown.
CriticalDamageNumbersTooltip: Display floating numbers above monsters, showing critical damage dealt by the player.
PeripheralLightingTooltip: Toggles lighting effects on connected peripherals.
KeyBindingModifierRestriction: Modifier buttons cannot be bound by themselves
HDRTooltip:
Allows for more detail in the lights and darks of the game visuals.

HDR is only available if your monitor supports it.
AdvancedTooltipCompareTooltip:
{c_highlight}Enabled:{/c} When comparing item tooltips, properties gained, lost, and changes to equipped Skills will be displayed.
{c_highlight}Disabled:{/c} When comparing item tooltips, only the primary stat will be compared.
MaxBackgroundFPSTooltip: Enable this option to limit and adjust the maximum framerate while running in the background.
DriverWarningText: {c_red}Your GPU drivers are out of date! Some features may not be available. Please exit the game and update them. {/c}
ScreenReaderVoiceTooltip: Defines the type of voice heard when screen reader is enabled.
ItemDropSoundQualityTooltip: Apply this effect to items at this quality level or higher.
ControllerInteractToggleTooltip:
{c_highlight}Enabled:{/c} Interact and casting your Basic Skill will utilize the same binding.
{c_highlight}Disabled:{/c} You can define separate bindings for Interact and your Basic Skill slot.
ReduceStrobingTooltip: This will disable several effects and lights in the game, reducing the amount of strobing in the game.
SafeZoneTooltip: Adjust the extents of your screen space
AudioDeviceTooltip:
The output device is where your sound will play.

Default will match your systems output device. Use this if you want to play the game through head phones or a different set of speakers.
FontColorPublicChatTooltip: Local area messages will appear in this color in text chat.
FontColorCombatWarningTooltip: Combat warning messages will appear in this color in text chat.
FontColorGuildTooltip: Clan messages will appear in this color in text chat.
FontColorPartyTooltip: Party messages will appear in this color in text chat.
NPCNameTextColorTooltip: Changes the color of NPC Names displayed within subtitles.
PlayerNameTextColorTooltip: Changes the color of the Player's Name displayed within subtitles.
Disable the operating system keyboard sh: :  is checked in the Universal Access preference pane in the System Preferences.{/c}
FontScalingTooltip: Adjusts the font scaling for subtitles.
FontColorWhisperTooltip: Whispered messages will appear in this color in text chat.
FontColorTooltip: Adjusts the font color of the subtitles.
HotKeyPageUpChatTooltip: Scrolls text chat up by a page.
ScreenReaderSpeedTooltip: Adjusts the speed of screen reader dictation.
AutoProgressDialogTooltip:
{c_highlight}Enabled:{/c} Cutscenes will progress automatically without requiring player interaction.
{c_highlight}Disabled:{/c} Certain cutscenes will pause after each line, requiring player input to continue. This feature may not apply to all cutscenes in the game.
CursorScaleTooltip: Adjusts all cursor sizing within the game.
ChatTextToSpeechTooltip: [PH] Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit.
VoiceOptionTooltip: Defines the type of voice heard when text to speech is enabled.
ChatBubblesPartyTooltip: Displays text chat from a party member over their head.
SoundChatLineBreaks: Play sound separating chat line breaks
SoundChatLineBreaksTooltip: Enable/Disable a sound that plays separating chat line breaks.
ChangeLocaleWarning: Changing the language requires restarting the game. Are you sure you want to proceed?
ScreenShakeTooltip: Show screen shake effects on certain Skills and abilities.
CharacterNameSpeechTooltip: Enable/Disable the character name during text to speech.
ColorBlindIntensityTooltip: Adjusts the intensity of the color blindness filter.  Lowering this will reduce the strength of the color adjustments in the game.
NotificationFriendAchievementTooltip: Displays a notification when a friend earns a Challenge.
LocalGameChannelTooltip: Enable/Disable text to speech for the Local channel.
TradeGameChannelTooltip: Enable/Disable text to speech for the Trade channel.
